Html:
I copied the Site.css and Site.Master from MvcMusicStore to my own application.
Change the controller and action accordingly in the Site.Master file.
However, I have no luck to separate the menu(genres) and the album on the left and right respectively.
Yes, the genre list is on the left, but the album list is 2 inches from the left.
So they are overlapped.

Not sure what else I missed?
